lines: SITTING AT THE FEET OF JESUS
1. Ndzi Tshame Emilengine Ku Yingisela Yesu, I Xivandla Lexo Xonga Hi Minkarhi Hinkwayo,
Emilengeni Ya Yesu Ndzi Tsunduka Swa Khale, Swa Rirhandzu, Nsovo Wakwe Yesu Ndza Amukela.
2.Emilengeni Ya Yesu I Minkateko Ntsena, Swidyoho Na Mahlomulo, Ndzi Swi Siya Ka Yesu,
I Xivandla Xo Wisela Ndhawu Ya Xikhongelo, Malwandla Ni Nsovo Wakwe, Swi Hi Nyika Ku Rhula.
3.Muponisi Ndzi Kutsule, Ndzi Khinsame Ka Wena, Mombo Wa Wena Wo Xonga Ndzi Langute Hi
Ndzi Endle Lowo Kwetsima No Hleketa Bya Wena.
Kombisa Hi Vululami Leswaku Ndzi Wa Wena.
